resources.string: android:logo: This attribute sets the logo of the toolbar. android:navigationIcon: This attribute sets the navigation icon of the toolbar. android:popupTheme: This attribute sets the theme of the popup menu that is displayed when the overflow icon is clicked. android:contentInsetStart: This attribute sets the amount of space that is inset from the left edge of the toolbar. android:contentInsetEnd: This attribute sets the amount of space that is inset from the right edge of the toolbar. android:contentInsetLeft: This attribute sets the amount of space that is inset from the top edge of the toolbar. android:contentInsetRight: This attribute sets the amount of space that is inset from the bottom edge of the toolbar. android:gravity: This attribute sets the gravity of the toolbar. android:maxButtonHeight: This attribute sets the maximum height of the overflow icon. android:collapseContentDescription: This attribute sets the description of the icon that is displayed when the toolbar is collapsed. android:collapseIcon: This attribute sets the icon that is displayed when the toolbar is collapsed. For a complete list of toolbar attributes, please refer to the Android Toolbar documentation: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/Toolbar.
